title: Reaction Diffusion Algorithm
description: In this coding challenge, I visualize a Reaction Diffusion simulation using the Gray Scott model in JavaScript (with the p5.js library).

timestamps.title: The grid stores the amount of a and b chemicals across every pixel
Create another array to store the next generation
Set the pixel colors based on the amount of a and b
Write a function to swap the current and next grid
Add the reaction diffusion formulas to the code
Seed a whole area with b
Recap of the code and suggestions for creative possibilities
